microprocessor.name: Control (MinRPS x3)
microprocessor.description: Return 0 only if all engines is off

node.label: Out (Minimum RPS)
node.description: 0 only if all engines is off

object.script:
-- Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function onTick() RPS1 = input.getNumber(1) RPS2 = input.getNumber(2) RPS3 = input.getNumber(3)
endRPS = math.max(RPS1, RPS2, RPS3)
if (RPS1+RPS2+RPS3)==0 then output.setNumber(1, 0) else if RPS1>0 and endRPS>RPS1 then endRPS = RPS1 end if RPS2>0 and endRPS>RPS2 then endRPS = RPS2 end if RPS3>0 and endRPS>RPS3 then endRPS = RPS3 end output.setNumber(1, endRPS) end end
